trans-unit.source: Provides extension methods you can use to add Windows Forms controls to Excel worksheets that have been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 提供扩展方法，它可用于向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具自定义的 Excel 工作表添加 Windows 窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions> methods are extension methods that are available on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection> object returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property (in an application-level project) or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property (in a document-level project) at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions>方法是可用的扩展方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection>返回对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>（在应用程序级项目中） 的属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>在运行时 （在文档级项目中） 的属性。

trans-unit.source: To add a specific control to a document, use the method that includes the name of the control in the method name.
trans-unit.target: 若要将特定控件添加到文档中，使用在方法名称中包含的控件名称的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about controls to a document, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关将控件到文档的详细信息，请参阅[在运行时向 Office 文档添加控件](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about extension methods, see [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51) and [Extension Methods](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6).
trans-unit.target: 有关扩展方法的详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/175ce3ff-9bbf-4e64-8421-faeb81a0bb51)和[扩展方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8020aae-374d-46a9-bcb7-8cc2390b93b6)。

trans-unit.source: In Excel add-in projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], you must add a reference to the Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.v4.0.Utilities.dll assembly before you can access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions> methods.
trans-unit.target: Excel 的外接程序项目面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，可以访问之前，必须添加对 Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.v4.0.Utilities.dll 程序集的引用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A> method to add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button> control to cell **A1**, and then adds text to the button.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A>方法将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button>控件添加到单元格**A1**，然后将文本添加到按钮。

trans-unit.source: To use this example, run it from the `Sheet1` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此示例中，运行从`Sheet1`文档级项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the control to.
trans-unit.target: 要添加控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Do not supply this parameter yourself.
trans-unit.target: 请勿自己提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: When you call this method on the collection returned by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.Controls" /> property (in an application-level project) or the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls" /> property (in a document-level project), this parameter is supplied automatically.
trans-unit.target: 对 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Worksheet.Controls" /> 属性（在应用程序级项目中）或 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.WorksheetBase.Controls" /> 属性（在文档级项目中）返回的集合调用此方法时，将自动提供此参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" /> that provides the bounds for the control.
trans-unit.target: 提供控件的边界的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Range" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that can be used to index the control in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 可用于索引 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" /> 实例中控件的控件名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button" /> control to the worksheet at the range specified.
trans-unit.target: 在工作表中的指定范围添加一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button" /> control that was added to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A> method enables you to add <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button> objects to the end of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlExtensions.AddButton%2A>方法使您能够添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button>到末尾的对象<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection>。

trans-unit.source: To remove a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button> that was previously added programmatically, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.Button>以编程方式之前，已添加，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The control automatically resizes when the range is resized.
trans-unit.target: 范围调整大小时，该控件自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: When you add multiple radio buttons directly to the document, the radio buttons are not mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 当您直接向文档添加多个单选按钮时，单选按钮不互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: You can write code to make the radio buttons mutually exclusive; however, the preferred approach is to add the radio buttons to a user control and then add the user control to the document.
trans-unit.target: 你可以编写代码以使单选按钮互斥;但是，首选的方法是向用户控件添加单选按钮，然后将用户控件添加到文档。

trans-unit.target: 若要删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.WebBrowser>之前以编程方式添加的控件，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ControlCollection.Remove%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.WebBrowser> control to the worksheet, and then navigates to www.microsoft.com. To use this example, run it from the `Sheet1` class in a document-level project.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.Controls.WebBrowser>控制转移到工作表中，然后导航到 www.microsoft.com。若要使用此示例中，运行从`Sheet1`文档级项目中的类。
